entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:31 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 06:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Freezing rain over southern sections early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of snow or rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
